short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make UMich Wolverine Access look better

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: University of Michigan Students!! Tired of the old, outdated look of Wolverine Access? Well, here's a solution: get this extension and forget about how it looked, think about how it WILL look! Enjoy the flat, handcrafted theme!
